definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
special appointment/special correspondent/task force/sb dispatched on a mission

sentences.english: Gillett and Hicks hired Barclays Capital to put out feelers internationally to find a buyer.
sentences.chinese: 吉列特和希克斯委託巴克萊幫助他們全球尋找買主。

sentences.english: Juve are expected to announce Trezeguet's departure before the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 預計在這個月底之前尤文會宣佈特雷澤蓋的離開。

sentences.english: Meg and gilbert are relaxing in first class .
sentences.chinese: 梅格和吉伯特在頭等艙裏休息。

sentences.english: Mr. Gilbert's heir inherited the house and a large sum of money.
sentences.chinese: 吉伯特先生的繼承人繼承了房子和一大筆錢。

sentences.english: Thirdly, Trammell was really a good rival.
sentences.chinese: 第三，特拉梅爾是一位可以激發劉翔潛能的對手。

sentences.english: My house is in the hills above Tiupllo, a very simple place.
sentences.chinese: 我的家在西班牙特普羅的山上，是個淳樸的地方。

sentences.english: The remains of Beddgelert lie there to this very day.
sentences.chinese: 貝德格勒特至今留在那裏。

sentences.english: Suit of storing heavy die or other heavy goods.
sentences.chinese: 可用於存放特重型模具或貨物。

sentences.english: He's been preparing to open the gate on…Mallet Island.
sentences.chinese: 他正在馬列特島上，準備打開魔界之門。

sentences.english: Delft is a blue - and - white ware.
sentences.chinese: 代爾夫特精陶是一種藍白色的陶器。

sentences.english: The aircraft uses the Foxhunter multi-mode air-intercept radar to detect and target hostile aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 該機採用福克斯特多模空中攔截雷達探測和目標敵機。

sentences.english: And, of course, we were fixed on the events that had occurred at Piedmont .
sentences.chinese: 當然，我們和在皮德蒙特高原發生的同樣的問題。

sentences.english: I'm at Earls Court Exhibition Center in London.
sentences.chinese: 我正在倫敦的厄爾斯考特展覽中心。

sentences.english: A group of chickens are planning to escape Tweedy's Farm.
sentences.chinese: 一羣特威迪農場的小雞正在策劃逃往。

sentences.english: The aim is to cut Sprint out of the loop.
sentences.chinese: 這麼做的目的就是要繞過斯普林特公司。

sentences.english: Bannister refused to work within the confines of the belief of the four-minute mile.
sentences.chinese: 班尼斯特拒絕在“四分鐘一英里”的範圍內工作。

definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
